text: Drew Doughty (born December 8, 1989) is a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman. He plays for the Los Angeles Kings of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was selected 2nd overall by the Kings in the 2008 NHL Entry Draft. He plays on Team Canada in the Olympics where he won a gold medal in the 2010 Winter Olympics. Doughty was named to the all-rookie team in the 2008-09 NHL season. He won the Stanley Cup with the Los Angeles Kings in 2012. == Other websites == * Category:1989 births Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Olympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:James Norris Memorial Trophy winners Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from London, Ontario Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:Medalists at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2014 Winter Olympics Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Ontario Hockey League players
title: Drew Doughty
